
# ==========================================================================

# CodeBook of "tidy_data.txt" file generated by executing "run_analysis.R"

# ==========================================================================


# The original dataset is available at "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip" and data analysis is carried out as a part of the project work of the course "Getting & Cleaning Data" from Coursera.

# This resultant dataset after the analysis is named as "tidy_data.txt" and it is a dataframe of 180 rows with 88 columns. The first two columns are for activity performed and subject who performed this activity. Remaining 86 are variables pertaining to each activity and subject combination.

# Each row of this dataset is the average of each variable for each activity and each subject from the main dataset.


# Description of the variables of "tidy_data.txt"
# ==========================================================================

 $ activity                               : 6 types of activities performed by each subject - "WALKING", "WALKING_UPSTAIRS", "WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS", "SITTING", "STANDING", "LAYING"

 $ subject                                : Total 30 subjects identified as 1, 2, 3, ......, 30 who performed the above 6 activities

# 'XYZ' is used to denote 3-axial signal means / standard deviations in the X, Y and Z directions.

# 'mean' denotes the mean of the signal and 'std'denotes the standard deviations of the signals.

# Description of the remaining 86 variables are provided below in a short form

# time.BodyAcc.XYZ - time domain body acceleration signal from accelerometer in X / Y / Z direction
# time.GravityAcc.XYZ - time domain gravity acceleration signal in X / Y / Z direction
# time.BodyAccJerk.XYZ - time domain body acceleration jerk signal in X / Y / Z direction
# time.BodyGyro.XYZ - time domain body angular velocity signal from gyroscope in X / Y / Z direction
# time.BodyGyroJerk.XYZ - time domain body jerk angular velocity signal in X / Y / Z direction
# time.BodyAccMag - time domain magnitude of body acceleration signal
# time.GravityAccMag - time domain magnitude of gravity acceleration signal
# time.BodyAccJerkMag - time domain magnitude of body acceleration jerk signal
# time.BodyGyroMag - time domain magnitude of body angular velocity signal from gyroscope
# time.BodyGyroJerkMag - time domain magnitude of body jerk angular velocity signal
# frequency.BodyAcc.XYZ - frequency domain body acceleration signal from accelerometer in X / Y / Z direction
# frequency.BodyAccJerk.XYZ - frequency domain body acceleration jerk signal in X / Y / Z direction
# frequency.BodyGyro.XYZ - frequency domain body angular velocity signal from gyroscope in X / Y / Z direction
# frequency.BodyAccMag - frequency domain magnitude of body acceleration signal
# frequency.BodyAccJerkMag - frequency domain magnitude of body acceleration jerk signal
# frequency.BodyGyroMag - frequency domain magnitude of body angular velocity signal from gyroscope
# frequency.BodyGyroJerkMag - frequency domain magnitude of body jerk angular velocity signal

# The names of the 86 variables are below with their few values
